text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
translation: Iyo rero Twebwe Allah Dushaka, Twari kurungika ku bantu bo muri buri gacimbiri Umugabisha abararikira ukwemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, ariko rero Ntumwa y’Imana! Twakurungitse ku bantu bose kugira ubashikirize iyi Qor’ani.
